chi.LeaveSpinningTop1: 嘻！看看！这也太蠢了，不配得到关注！嘻嘻嘻嘻！！
chi.LeaveSpinningTop2: 嘻！太无礼了！！我本来还打算送它个礼物呢。
chi.DieAtSpinningTop1: 嘻嘻嘻！！是的！！！回你的地底去吧！真是个笨蛋！！嘻嘻嘻嘻嘻
chi.DieAtSpinningTop2: 嘻嘻！看吧！！它们已经抓到你了！嘻嘻嘻嘻嘻
chi.DieAtSpinningTop3:
嘻嘻嘻嘻嘻嘻！！看起来这里也一样？？愚蠢到活不了，卑劣到死不了。
真无聊！啧！我要离开了。
chi.watcher-character-description:
一个局外者，孤独又疏离，持续观察却不入局。
这样的距离带来了新的视角和联系。这是一段独一无二的旅程。
chi.Hold the SPECIAL button to camouflage fr: 按住特殊键以针对掠食者进行伪装
chi.Hold UP and SPECIAL together to form new: 同时按住上键和特殊键以形成新的随机路径
chi.Delight! For you will be exalted in this: 欣喜吧！因为在这个新王国中，你将受到尊崇！
chi.This will consume the effect of a karma: 此过程将会消耗一朵业力花的效果
chi.Holding UP and SPECIAL without a karma f: 在没有业力花的时候，同时按住上键和特殊键并不稳定且十分危险
chi.However, this can also form new random p: 不过这样也能在紧要关头形成新的随机路径
chi.You can leave them here if you wish, as: 如果你愿意，可以把它们留在这里当做贡献。
chi.Crossing to new frontiers takes a toll o: 穿到新边境会对身体带来很大负担，不过睡觉有助于恢复
chi.Traveling too deep without resting will: 不眠不休地往深处旅行会产生某些后果
chi.A presence already binds this place: 一个存在已经和这个地方绑定了
chi.My processes will dissolve them to their: 我的过程会把它们分解成基本成分，然后这些成分会被添加到整体里。
请原谅我无法以同样的方式回应。这具躯体实在受限……
chi.How I have wished for this day. My dear: 我一直盼望着这一天。亲爱的朋友，欢迎你。
chi.Strong and quick, requiring a steady die:
强壮而敏捷，新陈代谢旺盛，需要稳定的肉类供给。但
果腹不会是你面前唯一的难题，毕竟猎手之路危机四伏。
chi.tips-distract:
你可以通过策略来对抗挡路的掠食者。
例如制造干扰、用响声吸引它们的注意力，
或是牺牲其他小生物等方法。
chi.tips-hoarding:
即使你已经吃饱了，你也可以在你的庇护所里储存一些额外的补给，
这样未来的雨循环会更轻松一些。
chi.tips-prepared:
不要空手踏上旅途。手中是否有可用的物品可能会决定你的生死……
你永远不知道什么时候可能需要它们。
chi.tips-backflip:
在快速变换你的运动方向的同时按下“跳跃”键，
可以使你进行后空翻，它的高度略高于正常的跳跃。
后空翻也可用于进行翻滚。
chi.tips-vertpole:
在后空翻的最高点用长矛向下投掷，可以在地面上形成一个垂直的
杆子。使用此方法可以进一步扩展你可以到达的地方。
chi.tips-wanderer:
漫游者看过这个世界的每一个角落，以及它所能提供的一切。
对他们来说，远方的旅程只不过是迈出的另一步而已。
chi.tips-spearstick:
你可以将长矛插入墙面来创建临时攀爬杆。使用此方法
可以开辟新路线并到达以前无法到达的位置。
chi.tips-batharvest:
用投射物将蝠蝇从空中击落可以使其更容易被捕捉。
用长矛刺穿它们可以一次捕捉多个。
chi.tips-reputation:
你的行为会在生态系统的成员中建立你的声望。
即使对你的敌人也要慷慨，也许你的善意会得到回报。
否则你可能会被所有生物追杀。
chi.tips-throwboost:
在半空中投掷物品会使你在投掷方向上获得一次轻微的加速。
你可以使用该操作扩大跳跃的水平距离。
chi.tips-tunnelturn:
在狭窄的过道中爬行时，
按住“跳跃”键和与朝向相反的方向键即可转身。
面对你爬行的方向时，你的移动速度更快。
chi.tips-powerthrow:
在滑行过程中向前投掷长矛会给长矛额外的速度
和冲击力。这可以使生物昏迷更长时间，并且可以
穿透某些防御。
chi.tips-superslide:
在滑行过程中向后抛出一个物体可以显著提高
滑行的距离。
chi.tips-wallpounce:
跃向墙壁，然后在接触时直接轻触“跳跃”键，同时保持方向键指向墙壁
可以大大增加返墙跳的反弹力。
chi.tips-deathrecovery:
食物链很复杂。如果你幸运的话，即使在被一个生物抓住之后，
如果它卷入冲突或自己被吃掉，它也可能会失去对你的控制！
chi.tips-utilitycreats:
并不是所有生物都是你需要躲避的掠食者。在你的旅程中，
有许多生物可能也会使你受益。
chi.tips-drop:
同时按下“下方向键”和“拾取”键将会把你手中的物品放在地面上，
而不会把它扔出去。
chi.tips-roll:
在从很高处坠落时，按住“斜下方向”键可以在
与地面接触时翻滚。这将减少坠落的影响并为你
提供额外的机动性。
chi.tips-swim:
在水下按照蛇形运动可以提高你的游泳速度。
你需要有节奏地上下或左右摆动身体。
chi.tips-monk:
僧侣踏上的是一条猎物之路。他们在这个世界的荒野中觅食求生，
但这条路并不能保证他们免受掠食者的威胁。
chi.tips-crouch:
你不需要按住“下方向键”即可保持蹲伏。轻触一次“下方向键”进入爬行
状态，然后轻触“上方向键”即可返回站立状态。
chi.tips-escape:
如果可以的话，最好避免对抗并逃离战斗。
许多掠食者都很强大而且很危险，所以不要太冲动了。
chi.tips-cheese:
利用管道与追捕你的掠食者交换位置。这可能是
一种甩掉它们的简单方法。
chi.tips-cannon:
在要从管道出来的瞬间轻触“跳跃”键，可以将自己快速
向外推动。
chi.tips-martyr: 殉道者会舍弃生存欲，慢慢凋零直至化作尘土。
chi.tips-hunter:
猎手踏上的是一条掠食者之路，但在这个残酷无情的世界里，
他们捕猎到的战利品并不总是能保证自己的生存。
chi.tips-outlaw: 暴徒生活在战场上。所有靠近他们的生物都会被消灭，无论是敌是友。
chi.tips-friend:
朋友会拥抱彼此和未知之物。这个世界是残酷无情的，
但只要在一起，你就可以找到保护和慰藉。
chi.Old tongue controls?: 确定使用传统的舌头控制方式吗？
chi.Enable speedrun timer?: 确定启用速通计时器吗？
chi.Enable shelter item transport?: 确定启用庇护所物品运输吗？
chi.Show tips between cycles?: 确定显示雨循环之间的提示吗？
chi.Enable Developer Commentary?: 确定启用开发者评论吗？
chi.Display a speedrun timer at the top of t: 确定要游玩期间在屏幕上方显示速通计时器吗？
chi.Activate tongue abilities with the throw: 确定要使用投掷按键而不是跳跃按键来激活舌头控制吗？
chi.Allow passages to transport key items in: 确定要允许使用通行证传送时将你庇护所中的关键物品运输至新目的地吗？
chi.Allow nearby creatures and key items to: 确定要允许附近生物和关键物品在蛞蝓猫的记忆地图上显示为图标吗？
chi.Enable slugcat's wall pouncing ability f: 确定要启用传统雨世界蛞蝓猫的返墙跳能力吗？
chi.Spawn developer commentary collectables: 确定要在单人剧情中生成开发者评论收藏品吗？
chi.Periodically show survival hints and exp: 确定要定期向新玩家展示生存提示并解释游戏机制吗？
chi.Configure the background image used on t: 配置标题界面使用的背景图像
chi.Configure the background image used in t: 配置子菜单使用的背景图像
chi.Wiggling around quickly might startle th: 快速摆动可能会吓到这个生物。
chi.I am afraid to ask how you brought your: 我真不敢问你是怎么把你朋友带过来的。
chi.tips-clock:
按下“地图”键还会显示其他信息，例如你的饱食度。
左下角的圆点表示距离降雨的所剩时间。
请密切关注它！
chi.tips-rocks:
石头可能不是一种致命的武器，但它有很多实际用途。它可以用来
分散注意力、偏转攻击、缴械、击晕、暴露弱点、将生物
从杆上和墙边击落等等！
chi.tips-audio:
特殊的音乐通常是危险来临时的第一个信号，
甚至会出现在你能亲眼看见危险之前。仔细辨别它。
chi.tips-slide:
在运动中按下“斜下方向”键并按下“跳跃”键即可开始滑行。
你将在短时间内快速滑过地面。
chi.tips-noise:
生物不仅可以通过视觉探测到你的存在，还可以通过声音。
请注意不要太大声，否则你可能会引起不必要的注意。
chi.tips-saint: 圣徒踏上的是一条和平之路。伤害其他生物就是伤害自己。
chi.tips-nomad:
流浪者经历了一个不断变化的世界。从此生到来生，
宛如在目标未知的无尽旅程中迈出一步。
chi.tips-pipeflash:
当另一端有危险时，管道入口会闪烁。闪烁的颜色
可以提示你危险的类型。
chi.tips-foodtypes:
蝠蝇和悬挂的水果远不是唯一的食物来源。有些植物
和生物可以食用，但只有在满足特定条件后才能食用。请多多尝试吧。
chi.tips-handorder:
你右手上的物品是会优先使用或扔出的物品。
连续轻触“拾取”键可以在你的双手之间交换物品。
chi.tips-slideleap:
在滑行或翻滚时轻触跳跃可以使其变为长距离跳跃。使用此方法
可以最大化你的机动性并迅速通过一大段距离。
chi.tips-turnboost:
快速变换运动方向将使你在新方向上短时间内
获得轻微的速度提升。之后持续跳跃可以使该
提速效果保持更长时间。
chi.tips-chieftain:
酋长会拥抱未知的力量和社区。他们已经成为
这个世界的一部分，有了新的纽带，他们就会生存下来。
chi.tips-swallow:
按住“拾取”键几秒钟，可以将不可食用的小物品
存放在你的胃中以确保安全。同样，按住它
也可以将物品重新吐出来。
chi.tips-breathe:
跳下水之前注意你的呼吸。如果你呼吸困难，
请先停留一会儿让自己喘口气。
chi.tips-polehop:
在落到横杆之前轻触“跳跃”键可以让你从杆子上弹起。
此方法可以与其他操作组合来快速跳过横杆。
chi.tips-scholar:
学者寻求了解世界曾经的样子。
他们凝视晶的历史，并在其中寻找新的意义。
chi.tips-deathpenalty:
在你准备好继续前进之前，死亡无关紧要。你可以花点时间
将谨慎抛之脑后，去进行实验、探索、了解地图布局、了解
食物位置等等。
chi.tips-shelterstore:
存放在庇护所中的物品会在雨循环之间保留，并且
即使你离开该区域，它们也会持续存在。它们是能让你的
贵重物品免受雨淋的唯一安全场所！
chi.tips-dragonslayer: 屠龙者热衷于狩猎。他们已经征服了这个世界的野兽。
chi.tips-tunnelboost:
在狭窄的过道中爬行时轻触“跳跃”键，
可以让自己的速度略微提升。
chi.tips-slidecancel:
在滑行过程中，可以快速轻触“跳跃”键和与运动方向相反的方向键。
这将取消滑行并返回到你开始滑行的位置。
chi.The use of some objects may not be obvio: 某些物体的用途乍一看可能并不明显，请尝试与你发现的所有物体互动吧！
chi.There are many paths to explore in this: 在这个世界上有许多可以探索的路径。
chi.If you are struggling, try returning to: 如果你遇到困难，请尝试返回之前的区域。
chi.You may find a new path forward, or disc: 你可能会找到一条新的前进道路，或者发现一些能让你在这里更容易生存的东西。
chi.However, there is nothing that stops you: 然而，没有什么能阻止你像现在这样克服该区域的挑战。
chi.Your friend is very large, how did you f: 你的朋友很大，你是怎么把它塞进来的？
chi.How did you bring that in here... I thin: 你怎么把它带进来的……我想它和我一样惊讶！
chi.I do enjoy the company of you and your f: 我确实喜欢你和你的朋友来陪我，<PlayerName>。
祝你和你的同伴好运。我的能力有限。
chi.Please do not bring more wildlife into m: 请不要把更多的野生动物带进我的房间。
chi.How did you fit them inside here anyhow?: 你是怎么把它弄进来的？
chi.Take your friend with you. Please. I beg: 带走你的朋友吧。拜托。算我求你的。
chi.Stop. If your intent is to damage my sys: 住手。如果你打算进一步损坏我的系统，那我没有理由把这场对话继续下去。
chi.Very well, you are on your own, creature: 很好，生物，我们从此分道扬镳。请你离开。
chi.We've read this, little creature. As pre: 我们读过这个了，小生物。正如此前所述：
chi.Hold Eat while grabbing an unconscious c: 抓住失去意识的生物时按住“进食”以撕咬
chi.Hold throw while flying to charge your a: 飞行时按住投掷，为你的飞升爆发充能。
chi.Hold the pick-up button to pull needles: 按住拾取按键从你的身上拔出针。
chi.You're not leaving? I suppose I should c: 你不走了？那，我就从我停下的地方继续……
chi.However, you really shouldn't stay. It's: 但是，你真的不该留下来，太危险了。
chi.Don't. My systems have already been dama: 不要。我的系统已经受损够严重了。走开。
chi.Best of luck to you, and your family. Th: 祝你和你的家人好运。我的能力有限。
chi.Five Pebbles (Linear Systems Rail): 五块卵石（线性系统导轨）
chi.Hello again. Shall I keep reading?: 又见面了。我要继续读吗？
chi.I have read this. As I have stated befor: 我读过这个。正如我之前所述：
chi.Explosive jump while holding down to par: 按住下键时爆炸跳跃以招架
chi.You'd better hurry along, little creatur: 你最好快点走，勇敢的信使。
chi.Press jump in the air to extend your ton: 在空中按下“跳跃”以伸出舌头
chi.Use directional inputs to aim the ascens: 使用方向键以确定飞升方向
chi.Did you not register what I've said to y: 你没听懂我跟你说的话吗？
chi.Please, leave quickly, while you still c: 拜托，快点离开，趁你还来得及。
chi.Stop! Stop giving me your junk!: 住手！别再把你的垃圾给我！
chi.saint_old_ascension_tutorial_ps: 使用方向键以确定飞升方向。
chi.Where do you find all of these?: 你在哪找到这些东西的？
我们看看你找到了什么。
chi.Leave me alone! You terrible creature!: 离我远点！你这个可怕的生物！
你可以在沙盒模式中找到蛞蝓猫幼崽。
很冷了……你最好离开这里。我没事的。
倾盆大雨就要开始了。你应该离开这里。
我们读过这个了，小生物。
那是新的东西吗？让我看看。
chi.Tap Pick up and Jump together to explosi: 同时轻触“拾取”和“跳跃”以进行爆炸跳跃
chi.Hold Throw while flying to perform an as: 飞行时按住“投掷”以进行一次飞升
chi.Rubicon content is now available in Aren: 魔方结点内容现在可以在竞技场模式中使用。
chi.I am surprised you have found so many of: 你能找到这么多，真让我惊讶。
chi.Ah, don't worry about me. You should get: 啊，不用担心我。你该出发了！
chi.Oh. It's you, why have you come back...?: 哦。是你，你怎么……又回来了？
chi.Hold Pick Up with an empty hand to gener: 单手空手按住“拾取”以生成一根长矛
chi.This is not a request. I have important: 这不是一个请求。我还有重要的事。
chi.Press throw with empty hands to extend y: 双手空手按下“投掷”以伸出舌头
chi.Hold Pick Up to move a spear to and from: 按住“拾取”将一根长矛移动到身前或身后
chi.Undelete the challenge you just deleted: 取消删除你刚刚删除的挑战后解锁。
chi.Hello again. I hope you have a reason to: 又见面了。我希望你来找我是有原因的。
chi.Tap Pick up and Jump together to take fl: 同时轻触“拾取”和“跳跃”以起飞
chi.You better go, <PlayerName>! I will be f: 你需要找个庇护所，<PlayerName>！不用担心我。
chi....So little... left. Why hurt... me mor: ……只剩……一点了。为什么……还要伤害我……
chi.saint_old_ascension_tutorial_switch: 使用方向键以确定飞升方向。
离我……远点……圆滚滚的……东西。
chi.Wait, please don't leave with that!: 等等，你不能带着那个离开！
chi.saint_old_ascension_tutorial_xbox: 使用方向键以确定飞升方向。
chi.Ah. Have you found something new?: 啊。你找到什么新东西了吗？
祝你好运。我不幸的小朋友。
chi.Hold Pick Up while holding up to combine: 按住上键的同时按住“拾取”以组合两种不同的物品
chi.Try using your weight in creative ways t: 尝试以创造性的方式利用体重来获得优势。
chi.Oh? What have you found this time? Let's: 哦？这次你又找到了什么？我读一下上面写的东西……
chi.Hold Pick Up to regurgitate a random ite: 按住“拾取”以反刍一件随机物品
chi.Clear a total of ## challenges to unlock: 总计完成##个挑战后解锁。
chi.There's not a lot of time. You should go: 时间不多了。你得动身了！
chi.Take your offspring with you when you go: 走的时候带上你的孩子。
chi.Have you brought something new this time: 这次带来什么新东西了吗？
chi.Looks to the Moon (Abstract Convergence: 仰望皓月（抽象汇聚集管）
chi.Change the slugcat class/abilities for P: 更改玩家<X>的蛞蝓猫职业/能力
chi.Refer to the Pause Menu for Safari Mode: 请参阅观览模式控制的暂停菜单。
chi.Submerged Superstructure (The Heart): 被浸没的巨构建筑（心脏）
chi.Submerged Superstructure (Vents): 被浸没的巨构建筑（通风口）
chi.While in the air, tap jump and pick-up t: 在空中时，同时轻触跳跃和拾取以进行腾飞。
chi.Developer Commentary mode is now availab: 开发者评论模式现在可在选项菜单中使用。
chi.Stop, that's dangerous! You are going to: 住手，那很危险！你又要弄坏东西了！
chi.Hold throw and directional inputs while: 在飞行时按住投掷和一个方向以执行一次飞升。
chi.Clear the game as Gourmand, Artificer, o: 用饕餮、工匠或猎手通关游戏后解锁。
chi.Hold the EAT button while a stunned crea: 在拿着昏迷的生物时按住进食键。
chi.The Rarefaction Cell item is now availab: 稀释电池现在可以在沙盒模式中使用。
chi.Little messenger, we do not have much ti: 小信使，我们没多少时间了。你得抓紧时间！
chi.Clear the game as Rivulet and Spearmaste: 用溪流和矛大师通关游戏后解锁。
chi.Breathes underwater, and moves through t:
可以在水下呼吸，轻松穿越世界。这些适应性是必不可少的，
因为你将面对一个洪水日益频繁的世界，在这个世界中时间至关重要。
chi.A fierce combatant, master of pyrotechni:
一个凶猛的战士，使用烟火和炸药的大师。渴望在食物链中
向上移动，你的旅程肯定会充满不断的流血和战争。
chi.Frail and armed with a long tongue. Your:
身体虚弱，长着一条长舌头。你将踏上一次圆满的领悟之旅，
但走这条路需要耐心、谨慎并与世界完全协调。
chi.An abnormality who feeds using needles p:
使用从身体上拔下的针头进食的异常生物；来自远方的旅人；
你内心深处的某种感觉再次让你踏上征程，信使……
chi.An indulger of the simpler pleasures in:
沉迷于生活中简单的乐趣。将世界装在肚子里
会带来许多战术优势，但代价是维持体力的成本提升。
chi.Looks to the Moon's Transcription (Pre-C: 仰望皓月的记录（崩塌前）
chi.The Rifle item is now available in Sandb: 步枪物品现在可以在沙盒模式中使用。
chi.How cute, you brought your family, <Play: 真可爱，你带着你的孩子，<PlayerName>？
chi.12th Council Pillar, the House of Braids: 第十二委员会支柱，编织议会
你可以在某些剧情中找到蛞蝓猫幼崽。
chi.Ah, you have found me something to read?: 啊，你找到想让我读给你听的东西了？
chi.Please, a moment of your time to finish?: 拜托，就占用你一点时间说完行吗？
chi.Revisit regions that were explored in th:
重新拜访在剧情篇章里已探索过的区域，
这次你将作为一个注视着生态系统发展的外部观察者。
不再受到玩家举止的影响。
chi.Try to meet the win requirements on a se:
尝试在预设竞技场方案里满足胜利的必要条件。
更多挑战会根据你的剧情篇章进展来解锁。
chi.While in the air, tap jump and pick-up t: 在空中时，同时轻触跳跃和拾取以激活业力启蒙。
chi.While in the air, press jump and pick-up: 在空中时，同时按下跳跃和拾取来爆发性地推动自己。
chi.Tap the throw button to extend your tong: 轻触投掷键伸出舌头。依附时按跳跃松开。
chi.Tap jump in the air to extend your tongu: 在空中轻触跳跃伸出舌头。依附时再次按跳跃松开。
chi.While you are attached to something, use: 当你依附于某物时，使用上下方向键来伸长或缩回你的舌头。
chi.You are cold and hungry. Find shelter fr: 你又冷又饿。尽快找到庇护所，否则你会冻死的。
chi.Only warm objects can rejuvenate your bo: 只有温暖的物体才能在这种极寒中恢复你的身体热量，但它们的热量不会永远持续下去！
chi.If you are going to make your visits a h: 如果你想让你的来访成为一种习惯，你至少要给我带来一些可以读的新东西。
chi.Stab creatures with your white needles t: 用你的白针刺伤生物，吸取其体内的能量。
chi.I wonder, just how much time has passed: 我想知道，这些珍珠自从写入后已经过了多长时间了。
chi.Another? Let us see... to be honest, I'm: 又一个？让我看看……说实话，我和你一样好奇。
chi.Hold up and grab with differing objects: 双手拿着不同的物体，同时按住上方向键和抓取键以获得新的东西。
chi.It is nice to see you again, but we do n: 很高兴再次见到你，但时间不多了。抓紧时间！
chi.Holding up and grab with two differing f: 双手拿着不同的食物，同时按住上方向键和抓取键，可以同时享用它们。
chi.You can also spit up random objects at t: 如果你体内没有任何东西，也可以用食物为代价吐出随机物体。
chi.What are you doing? Please!! I only just: 你在做什么？求求你！我才刚刚重获自由，你怎么能残忍到这个地步？
chi.Hold pick-up with compatible ammunition: 手持兼容弹药按住拾取键为步枪装弹。
chi.Ah, you remind me of an old creature who: 啊，你让我想起了一个以前经常光顾这里的老生灵。
chi.Hold pick-up to transform rocks or spear: 以食物为代价，按住拾取键将岩石或长矛变成爆炸物。
那是我仅剩的回忆了。没有它们，我会停止运转的。
chi.The passage of time has since taken them: 当然，时间的流逝已经把它们带走了。那是很久以前的事了。
chi.Combat and other fast movements will qui: 战斗和其他快速动作会让你很快筋疲力尽。
chi.Artificer can maul creatures while they: 工匠可以在生物还活着的时候撕咬它们。
chi.Please, don't scare me like that. I don': 请不要那样吓唬我。我不喜欢这样。
我希望你来找我是有原因的。我很忙。
chi.Another ordeal to add to my running tall: 我的霉运又多了一项考验……
chi.The Outer Expanse gate remains unlocked: 外层空间大门在该时间点后仍然是解锁状态。
chi.Pups can now be found in Sandbox Mode, a: 你可以在沙盒模式和某些剧情中找到蛞蝓猫幼崽。
chi.Let us see if there is anything importan: 我们看看是否有什么重要的东西写在上面。
chi.Little creature, please leave. I would p: 小恶棍，请离开吧。我更喜欢独处。
chi.What are you doing?! Just because you he: 你在干什么？你帮了我，不代表你可以这样对我。
chi.In your current state. I can only assume: 以你现在的状态。我只能假设你已经找到了你要找的东西。
chi.Why would you do that to me?! I don't un: 你为什么要那样对我？我不明白，<PlayerName>。
chi.Please stop! I beg you. I don't... under: 请住手！求求你。我不理解……你的动机……
chi.I can only think that you somehow find m: 我只能认为你因为某种原因觉得我很乐意倾听。
chi.Do you have something new, or have you c: 你是有什么新鲜东西，还是来盯着我看的？
chi.Your company is welcome little creature,: 欢迎你的到来，但是不能待太久。
chi.Why?! Why would you?? Please, I have so: 为什么？！你为什么要这样？？拜托，我还有很多事情要做……
chi.Thank you for visiting me, but I'm afrai: 谢谢你来看我，但恐怕我没什么可以给你的了。
chi.Despite some power to my facility being: 尽管我的设施恢复了一些电力，但它们对我的生存仍然至关重要！
chi.Your intention was to help me, was it no: 你的本意是帮助我，不是吗？那就请不要玩那些东西！
chi.This is no time for games little messeng: 没时间玩游戏了。快跑吧，现在还不晚！
chi.Those aren't toys, <PlayerName>. I canno: 那些不是玩具，<PlayerName>。我不会相信任何拿着它们的家伙。
chi.Stay as long as you'd like. But not too: 你想待多久就待多久。但也别待太久。
chi.Have you found something else for me to: 你找到什么需要我读的东西了吗？
chi.It is nice to see you again little messe: 很高兴再次见到你，小信使！
chi.This chamber is not very well insulated: 这个房间保温措施做的不是很好。
chi.I do enjoy the company though. You and y: 我确实喜欢有人陪伴。我随时欢迎你和你的家人。
chi.It's a piece of sharpened rebar... What:
这是一根削尖的钢筋……你想知道什么？
我不想冒犯你，但你似乎太虚弱了，它对你没有什么用。
chi.Unfortunately, my operations are encoded:
很不幸，我的操作编码有一个限制——阻止
我对我自己的公民采取暴力行动。
chi.You've returned! I thought you were leav: 你回来了！我还以为你要走了。那我继续了……
chi.Ah, nevermind, let me finish our convers: 算了，我们把刚才的话说完。
chi.Now, please leave. I would prefer to be: 现在请离开吧。我更喜欢独处。
chi.Please do not take advantage of this. I: 请不要利用这一点。我没有耐心让你继续留在这里。
chi.I'm returning to my work. Unless you hav:
我要回去工作了。除非你有什么对我有用的东西，
否则我没有什么可以对你说的了。
chi.Oh, it's you again? I had told you to le: 啊，又是你？我告诉过你离开这里永远不要回来的。
chi.Leave immediately and don't come back. A: 赶紧离开这里，别回来了。把它们也带上！
chi.Ah, you've returned. You know that I car: 啊，你回来了。你知道我很少关心在我设施中游荡的生物。
chi.For your own sake, I hope it was worth y: 为了你自己，我希望你的努力是值得的。
chi.For what reason do you visit so often? T: 你为什么经常来找我？我帮不上你了。
chi.I have nothing for you here little messe: 我这里没有东西给你，可怜的家伙。拜托，我时间不多了。
chi.Why did you send the messenger here agai:
怎么又派信使过来了？请离开，我不能再分心了。
我是现在唯一可以解决这个问题的迭代器了。我相信你理解我……
……这里什么都没有……什么都没有……剩下……
chi.I would appreciate if you would not eat:
如果你不吃那些，我将不胜感激。我的电缆会让我保持清醒，
但我每失去一个神经元，我也会失去一部分……
chi.Why have you returned? Do you have a dea:
你怎么又回来了？你想死吗？我没什么
可以给你的了……请离开，这是为了你好。
chi.You should not be here. This facility is:
你不应该在这里。这个设施处于不断腐化的状态。
这里的一切都不符合生命的正常定义。
chi.I used to be furious at the idea of crea:
我曾经对生物爬过我的巨构建筑的概念感到愤怒。
不过，我实际上很感激能有这个难得的互动机会。
chi.This easter egg was inspired by the orig: This easter egg was inspired by the original Moar Slugcats Dating Sim mod, but has no affiliation with the original creators.

chi.devtools-description:
启用游戏内开发者工具，它提供编辑地图和区域的必要工具，
并且可以帮助你为游戏添加模组。

在游戏中按“O”即可启用/禁用开发者工具，
然后按“H”即可调出主要开发者工具界面。

chi.What are you? If I had my memories I wou: 你是什么？要是有记忆的话我就能知道了……

chi.You get these at Five Pebbles'?<LINE>Tha:
这些是从五块卵石那里拿来的？
非常感谢。我确信他不会介意的。
chi.Create custom scenarios using levels, it:
使用已于剧情模式中解锁的关卡、物品和生物创建自定义场景。
可为击败生物和其他行为设定得分，
但沙盒模式更适于自定义和娱乐！
chi.For you though, there is another way. Th:
不过对你来说，还有另外一个方法。一条老路。向西穿过农场阵列，然后在大地断裂之处深入地下，
到你能抵达的最深处，古代文明就在那里建造了他们的神殿并跳着他们愚蠢的仪式舞蹈。
chi.Compete in a battle against each other a:
在和周围环境的激战中彼此角逐。
该模式中，吃下食物即可得分，
玩家存活越久，排名越高。
关卡、物品和生物可于剧情模式中解锁。
chi.No items except what you place in the ed: 只有你在编辑器中放置的物品

chi.MenuModList_ModButton_NonMouse_Blank_Con: 按“左方向键”移动至该内容的切换按键

chi.Press the MAP button to select the shelt: 按地图按键选择你想继续游戏的庇护所
chi.These are recommended starting points ba: 这些是根据不同的游戏风格推荐的起点。
chi.It also largely negates the game's diffi: 并且在很大程度上否定了游戏的难度曲线和进程。
chi.(Normally requires finding Green unlock: （通常需要在剧情地图中找到绿色解锁标记）

chi.Stop doing... this, or I... will not spe: 别……这样了，否则我……不会再和你……说话了。
chi.You have been signed out from PlayStatio: 你已登出PlayStation™Network。请连接到PlayStation™Network以查看排行榜。
chi.Items that typically attach to the terra: 通常通过茎干附着在地形上的物品在沙盒模式下会连同其茎干一起生成
chi.... You're getting quite good at this yo:
……你越来越擅长这个了。考古的小野兽。
我们来看看上面写了什么。
chi.You cannot use PlayStation™Network featu: 由于年龄限制，你无法使用该应用程序的PlayStation™Network功能。
chi.The following cheats unlock content you: 以下作弊信息可以解锁你通常通过寻找解锁标记才能获得的内容。
chi.This mod does not have any configurable: 此模组没有自己的拓展用户界面或配置。
chi.Thank you little creature. I must resume: 谢谢你，小生灵。我得继续工作了。
chi.Thank you. I must ask you... Don't do th: 谢谢你。我必须请求你……不要再那样做了。
chi.Periodically shows tips and tutorials du: 在两个雨循环之间的加载界面周期性显示提示和教程
chi.Introduces a few additional in-game tuto: 针对某些机制和场景引入一些额外的游戏内教程信息
chi.All cycles will have the same duration,: 所有雨循环将具有相同的持续时间，并且将始终使用尽可能长的持续时间
chi.You should try the 'Monk-style Gates' op: 在试图依赖该选项之前，你应该先尝试“僧侣式大门”选项。
chi.Increases the amount of time that rocks: 石头和蜗牛爆破可导致某些生物昏迷的时间增加
chi.Dynamic difficulty is influenced by numb: 动态难度受已探索区域数量的影响大于存活的雨循环次数
chi.Gives a chance of escaping from differen: 通过快速摇摆移动按键，有机会从不同的抓握中逃脱
chi.Prevents Jetfish from being able to knoc: 防止喷气鱼将物品从你手中击落
chi.Changes the amount of cycles Hunter star: 改变猎手在其剧情中开始时的雨循环数
chi.You're stuck in a cycle, a repeating pat: 你被困在了一个周而复始的循环当中。你想要找到出路。
chi.Another pearl! You want me to read this: 又一颗珍珠！你想让我也读一下这个吗？稍等一下……
chi.A pearl... This one is crystal clear - i: 一颗珍珠……这一颗晶莹剔透——这是最近才用过的。
chi.Use the throw button to activate tongue: 使用投掷按键而不是跳跃按键来激活舌头控制
chi.Passages bring all key items in a shelte: 传送会将庇护所中的所有关键物品带到新目的地，而不仅仅是胃里面的物品
chi.It's a piece of sharpened rebar... What:
这是一根削尖的钢筋……你想知道什么？
你似乎很擅长使用它。
chi.Key items are tracked on the map and wil: 在地图上追踪关键物品，如果丢失，将在随后的循环中在丢失的位置重新生成
chi.Centipedes will release you if you go th: 如果你在被一只蜈蚣抓住时穿过管道，蜈蚣会放开你
chi.Prevents the chance of the region being: 防止在庇护所发生故障的情况下该区域被洪水淹没的可能性
chi.Makes the death gradients on bottomless: 使无底深渊上的死亡渐变色更加明显
chi.This option disables multiple core mecha: 该选项会禁用多个游戏核心机制。
chi.It is strange... I'm remembering myself,: 奇怪了……我想起了自己，但也……想起了他。
chi.Allow passing any gate for free, regardl: 允许自由穿过任意大门，无论当前的业力等级
chi.Hide the remaining cycle time while in m: 在不受雨淋的地图中隐藏剩余的雨循环时间
chi.And this one is fresh! It was not long a: 而且这颗很新！里面的数据是不久前才被写入的！
chi.Adds additional deer behavior, like bein: 调整鹿的行为并添加额外机制以影响其行动
chi.You better go, <PlayerName>! I will be f:
你快走吧，<PlayerName>！我没事的。
下雨确实不舒服，不过我以前也经历过的。
chi.If enabled, all scavenger corpses in Art: 启用后，工匠剧情中的所有拾荒者尸体始终具有最大可能的业力值
chi.Allows certain passages to gain progress: 在求生者通行证完成之前允许完成其他通行证
chi.Settings designed to make the game signi: 旨在使游戏更轻松的设置，但可能会降低整体游戏体验。
chi.Reduces the volume for the sound effects: 降低大门和庇护所打开音效的音量
chi.Let us try again - not that it has worke: 我们再试一次——虽然你之前也没有好好听。我刚才在说……
chi.If you are having trouble, you may want: 如果遇到困难，可以先尝试僧侣剧情。它可以帮助你更好地感受游戏并轻松上手雨世界。
chi.If enabled, scavenger corpses in Artific: 启用后，工匠剧情中拾荒者尸体不会在每次雨循环后损失业力
chi.(Normally requires delivering pearls and: （通常需要在剧情地图中提交珍珠并找到广播标记）
chi.Know that this does not make you special:
要知道这并不会让你变得与众不同，从处理层中的微生物，到像我这样的——请见谅
——相对来说如神一般的存在而言，每个生物都遭遇着相同的困境。
chi.Look at me. The only thing I have to off:
看看我这个样子。我能给你的只有几句话而已。
既然你来到这里，我猜你一定是想听我说几句对吗？那么能请你好好听着吗？
要是不能的话，你就走吧。
chi.The bad news is that no definitive solut:
坏消息是，我们还没有找到确定的答案。而我们的设备每时每刻都因为风化腐蚀的原因变得更糟。
我救不了天下众生，也救不了你。我甚至救不了我自己。
chi.At the end of time none of this will mat:
到最后这一切大概都无足轻重，但你最好换一条路离开。
换一条不会让你……在我的内存阵列里嬉闹的路。这里就有一个好得不能再好的通道井。
chi.For you though, there is another way. Th:
不过对你来说，还有另外一个方法。一条老路。向西穿过农场阵列，然后在大地断裂之处深入地下，
到你能抵达的最深处，古代文明就在那里建造了他们的神殿并跳着他们愚蠢的仪式舞蹈。
我给你的印记可以让你一路通行无阻。
chi.The good news first. In a way, I am what:
先告诉你好消息。在某种程度上，我就是你在寻找的东西。我和我的同类
的目标，就是解决你和世间万物心中潜藏的那份幽闭恐惧症。
真是一次奇怪的施舍——你是个一无所知的受益者，而我是个不情不愿的礼物。至于那些高尚的施舍者呢？
已经不在了。
chi.You must be very brave to have made it a: 你能穿过艰难险阻来到这里，一定很勇敢。但很遗憾，你来这里没有任何用处。
chi.It is good to have someone to talk to af:
过了这么久，能遇到一个可以倾诉的对象真是太好了！
拾荒者不算是好的倾听者。不过他们偶尔会给我带来一些东西……
chi.I'm still angry at you, but it is good t:
我还在生你的气，但过了这么久，能遇到一个可以倾诉的对象还是挺好的。
拾荒者不算是好的倾听者。不过他们偶尔会给我带来一些东西……
chi.Even the scavengers that come here from: 就连时不时来这里的拾荒者，也都一无所获。但是……我已经告诉过你了，不是吗？
chi.I do enjoy the company though. You're we: 不过，我确实喜欢有谁来陪陪我。你可以多呆一会儿，安静的小家伙。
chi.I have had scavengers come by before. Sc:
拾荒者曾经来过我这里。那是拾荒者啊！
而他们让我活着！
但……这件事我对你说过，对吧？
chi.You must excuse me if I repeat myself. M:
你得原谅我一直在说重复的话。我的记忆很差。
本来我是有五个可悲的神经元的……而你吃了一个。
也许这件事我也对你说过了。
chi.Or actually I'm sure he would, but he ha:
或者其实他很介意，不过他的神经元非常多~
这对他来说无关痛痒。
但对我来说就是救命稻草！谢谢你，小生灵！
chi.You come here, but you can't be respectf:
虽然你来了，但如果要想听我说话，你就得足够尊敬我。
这次你会听我的吗？

eng.LeaveSpinningTop1: OA! Look! It's too stupid to even pay attention! OAOAOAOA!!
eng.LeaveSpinningTop2: OA!! How rude!! I was going to give it a gift.
eng.DieAtSpinningTop1: OAOAOA!! Yes!!! Back into the ground you go!! What an idiot!! OAOAOAOAOAO
eng.DieAtSpinningTop2: OA!! See!! They get you already! OAOAOAOAOAO
eng.DieAtSpinningTop3:
OAOAOAOAOA!! And here too it seems?? Too dumb to live, too base to die.
How boring! Bleh! I will depart.
eng.watcher-character-description:
An outsider, alone and aloof. Observing but not engaging.
From this distance comes new perspectives, and new connections. A journey like no other.
Never again will you be alone.
eng.Hold the SPECIAL button to camouflage fr: Hold the SPECIAL button to camouflage from predators
eng.Hold UP and SPECIAL together to form new: Hold UP and SPECIAL together to form new random paths
eng.Delight! For you will be exalted in this: Delight! For you will be exalted in this new kingdom!
eng.This will consume the effect of a karma: This will consume the effect of a karma flower in the process
eng.Holding UP and SPECIAL without a karma f: Holding UP and SPECIAL without a karma flower is unstable and dangerous
eng.However, this can also form new random p: However, this can also form new random paths in a pinch
eng.You can leave them here if you wish, as: You can leave them here if you wish, as a contribution.
eng.Crossing to new frontiers takes a toll o: Crossing to new frontiers takes a toll on the body, but sleep can help you recover
eng.Traveling too deep without resting will: Traveling too deep without resting will have consequences
eng.A presence already binds this place: A presence already binds this place
eng.This fringe is already too unstable: This fringe is already too unstable
eng.Nothing to waste, every bit counts!: Nothing to waste, every bit counts!
eng.Oh such enthusiasm! I am honored!: Oh such enthusiasm! I am honored!
eng.This remains a place of rest: This remains a place of rest
eng.It is a joy to see you play!: It is a joy to see you play!
eng.My processes will dissolve them to their: My processes will dissolve them to their base components and those components will be added to the mass.
eng.Ahh yes! The paths! How wonderous!: Ahh yes! The paths! How wonderous!
How auspicious it was, our meeting...
Forgive me if I cannot respond in kind. This body is so limited...
eng.How I have wished for this day. My dear: How I have wished for this day. My dear friend, welcome.
eng.Strong and quick, requiring a steady die:
Strong and quick, requiring a steady diet of meat. But the stomach wont be your only
concern... this path is one of extreme peril where every cycle eats away at an ominous countdown.
eng.tips-distract:
A predator blocking the way can be overcome with many tactics. Create a
distraction, lure them away with noise, deploy a sacrifice that they can eat
instead of eating you, etc.
eng.tips-hoarding:
Even if you are already full up on food, you can hoard extra supplies
inside of your shelter to make future cycles easier on yourself.
eng.tips-prepared:
Don't travel empty handed. Having items immediately available can be the
difference between life and death... you never know when you may need them.
eng.tips-backflip:
Quickly swap your direction of motion, and at the same time press the jump
button. This will initiate a back-flip, which has slightly more height than a
normal jump. Backflips can also be used to initiate a roll.
eng.tips-vertpole:
At the peak of a back-flip, throw downwards with a spear to create a vertical
pole in the ground. Use this to expand the places you can reach even further.
eng.tips-wanderer:
The Wanderer has seen every corner of this world, and all it has to offer.
The journey beyond is only another step to them.
eng.tips-spearstick:
Spears can be lodged into surfaces to create makeshift climbing poles. Use this
to open up new routes and get to previously inaccessible locations.
eng.tips-batharvest:
Knock batflies out of the air with projectiles to make them easier to capture.
Skewer them with spears to capture multiple at once.
eng.tips-reputation:
Your actions develop your reputation amongst the ecosystem's populace.
Be generous even to your enemies, and perhaps the favor will be returned.
Otherwise you may become hunted by all.
eng.tips-throwboost:
Throwing an item mid-air gives you a slight boost in the direction thrown.
Use this to extend the horizontal range of your jumps.
eng.tips-tunnelturn:
While crawling through a tight corridor, hold the jump button and the opposite
direction of where you're facing to turn around. You move faster while facing
the direction you're crawling.
eng.tips-powerthrow:
Throwing a spear forward during a slide will give the spear extra speed
and impact. This can stun creatures for a longer period of time, and can
pierce certain defenses.
eng.tips-superslide:
Throw an object backward during a slide to dramatically increase the
distance covered by the slide.
eng.tips-wallpounce:
Pouncing toward a wall, then tapping the jump button directly on impact while
holding toward the wall will greatly increase the rebound force of your wall jumps.
eng.tips-deathrecovery:
The food chain is complex. If you're lucky, even after being grabbed by a creature,
they may later lose grasp of you if they wind up in a skirmish or get eaten themselves!
eng.tips-utilitycreats:
Not every creature is a predator to be avoided. There are many creatures
that may be able to benefit you on your journey as well.
eng.tips-drop:
Pressing down and the pick-up button together will place the item in your hand
on the ground without throwing it.
eng.tips-roll:
While falling a far distance, hold diagonally downwards to initiate a roll on
contact with the ground. This will reduce the impact of the fall and give
you some extra mobility.
eng.tips-swim:
Move in a controlled snaking motion underwater to improve your swimming
speed. Wiggle your body rhythmically up and down, or left and right.
eng.tips-monk:
The Monk is the path of prey. Foraging through the wilds of this world to survive,
but this path does not guarantee safety in a world of predators.
eng.tips-crouch:
You don't have to hold down to stay crouched. Tap down once to enter the crawling
state, and tap up to return back to standing.
eng.tips-escape:
When possible, it's often better to avoid confrontation and escape from fights.
Many predators are powerful and dangerous, so don't get overzealous.
eng.tips-cheese:
Utilize pipes to swap places with a predator that is pursuing you. This can be
an easy way to shake them off your tail.
eng.tips-cannon:
Tap the jump button right when coming out of a pipe to propel yourself
quickly outward.
eng.tips-martyr: The Martyr discards their own survival, withering away until their body becomes dust.
eng.tips-hunter:
The Hunter is the path of a predator, but in this cruel and uncaring world the
spoils of their hunt do not always guarantee survival.
eng.tips-outlaw: The Outlaw lives their life in battle. All that come near are slain, friend and foe alike.
eng.tips-friend:
The Friend embraces the other and the unknown. The world is cruel and unforgiving,
but together, comfort and protection can be found.
eng.Display a speedrun timer at the top of t: Display a speedrun timer at the top of the screen during gameplay?
eng.Activate tongue abilities with the throw: Activate tongue abilities with the throw button instead of the jump button?
eng.Allow passages to transport key items in: Allow passages to transport key items in your shelter to your new destination?
eng.Allow nearby creatures and key items to: Allow nearby creatures and key items to be visible as icons on slugcat's memory map?
eng.Enable slugcat's wall pouncing ability f: Enable slugcat's wall pouncing ability from legacy Rain World versions?
eng.Spawn developer commentary collectables: Spawn developer commentary collectables in the single player campaigns?
eng.Periodically show survival hints and exp: Periodically show survival hints and explain gameplay mechanics for new players?
eng.Configure the background image used on t: Configure the background image used on the title screen
eng.Configure the background image used in t: Configure the background image used in the sub menus
eng.Wiggling around quickly might startle th: Wiggling around quickly might startle this creature.
eng.I am afraid to ask how you brought your: I am afraid to ask how you brought your friend here.
eng.tips-clock:
Pressing the map button also reveals other information such as your food bar.
The circle of dots in the bottom-left represents the time until the rain comes.
Pay close attention to it!
eng.tips-rocks:
Rocks may not be a lethal weapon, but they have many practical uses. They
can distract, deflect, disarm, stun, reveal weak points, knock creatures off
of poles and ledges, etc!
eng.tips-audio:
Audible clues are often your first indicator of impending danger, even before
the danger is visible. Listen carefully.
eng.tips-slide:
Press diagonally downwards plus the jump button while in motion to initiate
a slide. You will slide across the ground covering distance quickly for a short
period of time.
eng.tips-noise:
Creatures can detect your presence not just by sight, but also by noise. Be
mindful about being too loud, otherwise you may attract unwanted attention.
eng.tips-saint: The Saint is a path of pacifism. To bring harm to another is to bring harm to one's self.
eng.tips-nomad:
The Nomad experiences an ever-changing world. Living one life to the next as
just steps in an endless journey toward an unknown goal.
eng.tips-pipeflash:
Pipe entrances flash when there is danger on the other side. The color of the
flash can clue you in on the type of danger.
eng.tips-foodtypes:
Batflies and hanging fruits are far from the only sources of food. Some plants
and creatures are edible, but only once certain conditions are met. Experiment.
eng.tips-handorder:
The item in your right hand is the primary item that will be used or thrown first.
Double-tapping the pick-up button will swap items between your two hands.
eng.tips-slideleap:
Tap jump during a slide or a roll to chain it into a long jump. Use this to
maximize your mobility and cover a lot of distance quickly.
eng.tips-turnboost:
Quickly swapping direction of motion will give you a slight speed boost for a
short time in the new direction. Keep hopping afterwards to maintain this
speed boost for longer.
eng.tips-chieftain:
The Chieftain embraces strength and community in the unknown. They have become
part of this world, and with their new bonds, they will survive it.
eng.tips-swallow:
Small, non-edible items can be stored in your stomach for safe keeping by
holding down the pick-up button for a few seconds. Likewise, hold it to
regurgitate the item back up.
eng.tips-breathe:
Pay attention to your breathing before jumping underwater. If you are breathing
heavy, stand still and give yourself a second to catch your breath first.
eng.tips-polehop:
Tapping the jump button just before intersecting a horizontal pole allows
you to bounce off the pole. This can be chained to quickly hop across poles.
eng.tips-scholar:
The Scholar seeks to understand the world as it once was. Gazing into a
crystallized past, and finding new meaning within it.
eng.tips-deathpenalty:
Death matters little until you are ready to move on. Take some time to throw
caution to the wind and experiment, explore, learn the layout of land, learn
food locations, etc.
eng.tips-shelterstore:
Items stored in shelters will stay there between cycles, and will persist
even if you leave the region. They are the only safe places to keep your
valuables from the rain!
eng.tips-dragonslayer: The Dragon Slayer embraces the hunt. They have brought the beasts of this world to heel.
eng.tips-tunnelboost:
Tap the jump button while crawling in a tight corridor to give yourself a
slight boost in speed.
eng.tips-slidecancel:
During a slide, quickly tap the jump button plus the opposite direction of
motion. This will cancel the slide and return you to where you started.
eng.The use of some objects may not be obvio: The use of some objects may not be obvious at first glance, experiment with everything you find!
eng.There are many paths to explore in this: There are many paths to explore in this world.
eng.If you are struggling, try returning to: If you are struggling, try returning to a previous region.
eng.You may find a new path forward, or disc: You may find a new path forward, or discover something that makes your survival here easier.
eng.However, there is nothing that stops you: However, there is nothing that stops you from overcoming this region's challenges as you are right now.
eng.Your friend is very large, how did you f: Your friend is very large, how did you fit them in here?
eng.How did you bring that in here... I thin: How did you bring that in here... I think it is as surprised as I am!
Oh, that is not a friend...
eng.I do enjoy the company of you and your f: I do enjoy the company of you and your friend though, <PlayerName>.
Best of luck to you, and your companion. There is nothing else I can do.
eng.Please do not bring more wildlife into m: Please do not bring more wildlife into my chamber.
eng.How did you fit them inside here anyhow?: How did you fit them inside here anyhow?
eng.Take your friend with you. Please. I beg: Take your friend with you. Please. I beg you.
Ah, you must be in a rush.
eng.Stop. If your intent is to damage my sys: Stop. If your intent is to damage my systems further, then I have no reason to continue this conversation.
eng.Very well, you are on your own, creature: Very well, you are on your own, creature. Please leave.
eng.We've read this, little creature. As pre: We've read this, little creature. As previously stated:
eng.Hold Eat while grabbing an unconscious c: Hold Eat while grabbing an unconscious creature to maul
eng.Hold throw while flying to charge your a: Hold throw while flying to charge your ascension burst.
eng.Hold the pick-up button to pull needles: Hold the pick-up button to pull needles from your body.
eng.You're not leaving? I suppose I should c: You're not going? I suppose I will pick up where I left off then...
eng.However, you really shouldn't stay. It's: But, you really should not stay. It's too dangerous.
eng.Don't. My systems have already been dama: Don't. My systems have already been damaged enough as it is. Go away.
eng.Best of luck to you, and your family. Th: Best of luck to you, and your family. There is nothing else I can do.
eng.Have you brought your family here?: Do you have a little one with you?
eng.Hello again. Shall I keep reading?: Hello again. Shall I keep reading?
eng.I have read this. As I have stated befor: I have read this. As I have stated before:
eng.Explosive jump while holding down to par: Explosive jump while holding down to parry
eng.You'd better hurry along, little creatur: You'd better hurry along, brave messenger.
eng.I have nothing to say to you, <PlayerNam: I have nothing to say to you, <PlayerName>.
eng.Press jump in the air to extend your ton: Press jump in the air to extend your tongue
eng.Use directional inputs to aim the ascens: Use directional inputs to aim the ascension
eng.Did you not register what I've said to y: Did you not register what I've said to you?
eng.Please, leave quickly, while you still c: Please, leave quickly, while you still can.
eng.Stop! Stop giving me your junk!: Stop! Stop giving me your junk!
eng.saint_old_ascension_tutorial_ps: Use directional inputs to aim the ascension.
Clear the game as ## to unlock.
eng.Where do you find all of these?: Where do you find all of these?
Let us see what you have found.
eng.Leave me alone! You terrible creature!: Leave me alone! You terrible creature!
Pups can now be found in Sandbox Mode.
Cold... You better leave. I will be fine.
The downpour is about to start. You should get out of here.
We have read this one, little creature.
Clear the game as <X> or <Y> to unlock.
Is that something new? Allow me to see.
eng.Hold to select and use doors: Hold to select and use doors
eng.Tap Pick up and Jump together to explosi: Tap Pick up and Jump together to explosive jump
eng.Hold Throw while flying to perform an as: Hold Throw while flying to perform an ascension
eng.Rubicon content is now available in Aren: Rubicon content is now available in Arena Mode.
eng.I am surprised you have found so many of: I am surprised you have found so many of these.
eng.Ah, don't worry about me. You should get: Ah, don't worry about me. You should get going!
eng.Oh. It's you, why have you come back...?: Oh. It's you, why have you come back...? Again.
eng.Hold Pick Up with an empty hand to gener: Hold Pick Up with an empty hand to generate a spear
eng.This is not a request. I have important: This is not a request. I have important work to do.
eng.Press throw with empty hands to extend y: Press throw with empty hands to extend your tongue
eng.Hold Pick Up to move a spear to and from: Hold Pick Up to move a spear to and from your back
eng.Undelete the challenge you just deleted: Undelete the challenge you just deleted to unlock.
eng.Hello again. I hope you have a reason to: Hello again. I hope you have a reason to visit me.
eng.Tap Pick up and Jump together to take fl: Tap Pick up and Jump together to take flight
eng.You better go, <PlayerName>! I will be f: You need to find shelter, <PlayerName>! Don't worry about me.
eng....So little... left. Why hurt... me mor: ...So little... left. Why hurt... me more...
eng.saint_old_ascension_tutorial_switch: Use directional inputs to aim the ascension.
eng.Have you come back to see me again?: Have you come back to see me again?
eng.Wait, please don't leave with that!: Wait, you cannot leave with that!
eng.saint_old_ascension_tutorial_xbox: Use directional inputs to aim the ascension.
eng.Ah. Have you found something new?: Ah. Have you found something new?
Good luck, my unfortunate little friend.
eng.Hold Pick Up while holding up to combine: Hold Pick Up while holding up to combine two differing items
eng.Try using your weight in creative ways t: Try using your weight in creative ways to gain an advantage.
eng.Oh? What have you found this time? Let's: Oh? What have you found this time? Let's read what it says...
eng.Hold Pick Up to regurgitate a random ite: Hold Pick Up to regurgitate a random item
eng.Clear a total of ## challenges to unlock: Clear a total of ## challenges to unlock.
eng.There's not a lot of time. You should go: There's not a lot of time. You must move along!
eng.Take your offspring with you when you go: Take your offspring with you when you go.
eng.Have you brought something new this time: Have you brought something new this time?
eng.Looks to the Moon (Abstract Convergence: Looks to the Moon (Abstract Convergence Manifold)
eng.Change the slugcat class/abilities for P: Change the slugcat class/abilities for Player <X>
eng.Refer to the Pause Menu for Safari Mode: Refer to the Pause Menu for Safari Mode controls.
Welcome back. As I was saying...
eng.While in the air, tap jump and pick-up t: While in the air, tap jump and pick-up together to take flight.
eng.Developer Commentary mode is now availab: Developer Commentary mode is now available in the Options menu.
eng.Stop, that's dangerous! You are going to: Stop, that's dangerous! You are going to break something again!
eng.Hold throw and directional inputs while: Hold throw and directional inputs while flying to perform an ascension.
eng.Clear the game as Gourmand, Artificer, o: Clear the game as Gourmand, Artificer, or Hunter to unlock.
eng.Hold the EAT button while a stunned crea: Hold the EAT button while a stunned creature is being held.
eng.The Rarefaction Cell item is now availab: The Rarefaction Cell item is now available in Sandbox Mode.
eng.Little messenger, we do not have much ti: Little messenger, we do not have much time. You must hurry!
eng.Clear the game as Rivulet and Spearmaste: Clear the game as Rivulet and Spearmaster to unlock.
eng.Breathes underwater, and moves through t:
Breathes underwater, and moves through the world with ease. These adaptations are essential,
as you'll be pitted against a world of increasingly frequent floods, where time is of the essence.
eng.A fierce combatant, master of pyrotechni:
A fierce combatant, master of pyrotechnics and explosives. Keen to move up in
the foodchain, your journey will surely be one lined with constant bloodshed and warfare.
eng.Frail and armed with a long tongue. Your:
Frail and armed with a long tongue. Your journey will be one of perfect enlightenment,
but walking this path requires patience, caution, and complete attunement with the world.
eng.An abnormality who feeds using needles p:
An abnormality who feeds using needles pulled from its body. A traveler from a
far away land; A feeling in your depths sets you out once again, messenger...
eng.An indulger of the simpler pleasures in:
An indulger of the simpler pleasures in life. Carrying the world in your stomach gives
many tactical advantages, but comes at an increased cost of sustainability.
eng.The Rifle item is now available in Sandb: The Rifle item is now available in Sandbox Mode.
eng.How cute, you brought your family, <Play: How cute, you brought your child, <PlayerName>?
eng.12th Council Pillar, the House of Braids: 12th Council Pillar, the House of Braids
Pups can now be found in some campaigns.
eng.Ah, you have found me something to read?: Ah, you have found me something to read?
Please be careful on your journey.
eng.Please, a moment of your time to finish?: Please, a moment of your time to finish?
eng.Revisit regions that were explored in th:
Revisit regions that were explored in the story campaigns,
this time as an outside observer that watches the ecosystem
unfold, uninterrupted by the antics of the player.
eng.Try to meet the win requirements on a se:
Try to meet the win requirements on a series of pre-constructed arena
scenarios. More challenges will be unlocked as progression is made by
clearing the story campaigns.
eng.While in the air, tap jump and pick-up t: While in the air, tap jump and pick-up together to activate karmic enlightenment.
eng.While in the air, press jump and pick-up: While in the air, press jump and pick-up together, to propel yourself explosively.
eng.Tap the throw button to extend your tong: Tap the throw button to extend your tongue. Press jump while attached to let go.
eng.Tap jump in the air to extend your tongu: Tap jump in the air to extend your tongue. Press jump again while attached to let go.
eng.While you are attached to something, use: While you are attached to something, use up and down to extend or retract your tongue.
eng.You are cold and hungry. Find shelter fr: You are cold and hungry. Find shelter from the storm soon, or you will pass out from the cold.
eng.Only warm objects can rejuvenate your bo: Only warm objects can rejuvenate your body heat in this extreme cold, but they will not last forever!
eng.If you are going to make your visits a h: If you are going to make your visits a habit, the least you can do is bring me something new to read.
eng.Stab creatures with your white needles t: Stab creatures with your white needles to leech energy from their bodies.
eng.I wonder, just how much time has passed: I wonder, just how much time has passed since some of these were written.
eng.Another? Let us see... to be honest, I'm: Another? Let us see... to be honest, I'm as curious to examine it as you are.
eng.Hold up and grab with differing objects: Hold up and grab with differing objects in each hand, in order to procure something new.
eng.It is nice to see you again, but we do n: It is nice to see you again, but the clock is ticking. Make haste!
eng.Holding up and grab with two differing f: Holding up and grab with two differing food items, will eat them together as a meal.
eng.You can also spit up random objects at t: You can also spit up random objects at the cost of food, if nothing is stored inside of you.
eng.What are you doing? Please!! I only just: What are you doing? Please!! I only just got my freedom back, how cruel can you possibly be?
eng.Hold pick-up with compatible ammunition: Hold pick-up with compatible ammunition in hand to load the rifle.
eng.Ah, you remind me of an old creature who: Ah, you remind me of an old creature who used to visit here often.
eng.Hold pick-up to transform rocks or spear: Hold pick-up to transform rocks or spears into explosives, at the cost of food.
Those are the only memories I have left. I will cease functioning without them.
eng.The passage of time has since taken them: The passage of time has since taken them away, of course. That was a while ago.
eng.Combat and other fast movements will qui: Combat and other fast movements will quickly exhaust you.
eng.Artificer can maul creatures while they: Artificer can maul creatures while they are still alive.
eng.Please, don't scare me like that. I don': Please, don't scare me like that. I don't appreciate it.
Now, I hope you have reason to visit me. I am very busy.
eng.Another ordeal to add to my running tall: Another ordeal to add to my running tally of bad luck...
eng.The Outer Expanse gate remains unlocked: The Outer Expanse gate remains unlocked beyond this point in the timeline.
eng.Pups can now be found in Sandbox Mode, a: Pups can now be found in Sandbox Mode, and some campaigns.
eng.Let us see if there is anything importan: Let us see if there is anything important written on this.
eng.Little creature, please leave. I would p: Little ruffian, please leave. I would prefer to be alone.
eng.What are you doing?! Just because you he: What are you doing?! Just because you helped me doesn't mean you can treat me this way.
eng.In your current state. I can only assume: In your current state. I can only assume that you have found what you were looking for.
eng.Why would you do that to me?! I don't un: Why would you do that to me?! I don't understand you, <PlayerName>.
eng.Please stop! I beg you. I don't... under: Please stop! I beg you. I don't... understand your motivation...
eng.I can only think that you somehow find m: I can only think that you somehow find me pleasant to listen to.
eng.Do you have something new, or have you c: Do you have something new, or have you come to just stare at me?
eng.Your company is welcome little creature,: Your company is welcome for now, but you cannot stay.
eng.Why?! Why would you?? Please, I have so: Why?! Why would you?? Please, I have so much more I need to do, still...
eng.Thank you for visiting me, but I'm afrai: Thank you for visiting me, but I'm afraid there is nothing here for you.
eng.Despite some power to my facility being: Despite some power to my facility being restored, those are still crucial to my survival!
eng.Your intention was to help me, was it no: Your intention was to help me, was it not? Then please don't play with those!
eng.This is no time for games little messeng: This is no time for games. Run along now, before it is too late!
eng.Those aren't toys, <PlayerName>. I canno: Those aren't toys, <PlayerName>. I cannot trust anyone with them.
eng.Stay as long as you'd like. But not too: Stay as long as you'd like. But not too long.
eng.Have you found something else for me to: Have you found something else for me to read?
eng.It is nice to see you again little messe: It is nice to see you again little messenger!
eng.This chamber is not very well insulated: This chamber is not very well insulated from the cold.
eng.I do enjoy the company though. You and y: I do enjoy the company though. You and your family are always welcome here.
eng.It's a piece of sharpened rebar... What:
It's a piece of sharpened rebar... What is it you want to know?
I don't wish to offend, but you seem too frail to use this effectively.
eng.Unfortunately, my operations are encoded:
Unfortunately, my operations are encoded with a restriction that prevents
me from carrying out violent actions against my own citizens.
eng.You've returned! I thought you were leav: You've returned! I thought you were walking away.  Allow me to continue...
eng.Ah, nevermind, let me finish our convers: Nevermind, let me finish our conversation.
eng.Now, please leave. I would prefer to be: Now, please leave. I would prefer to be alone.
eng.Please do not take advantage of this. I: Please do not take advantage of this. I do not have the patience for your continued presence here.
eng.I'm returning to my work. Unless you hav:
I'm returning to my work. Unless you have anything productive
for me, I have nothing further to say to you.
eng.Oh, it's you again? I had told you to le: Oh, it's you again? I had told you to leave and never return.
eng.Leave immediately and don't come back. A: Leave immediately and don't come back. And take THEM with you!
eng.Ah, you've returned. You know that I car: Ah, you've returned. You know that I care very little for the creatures that wander through my facility.
eng.For your own sake, I hope it was worth y: For your own sake, I hope it was worth your struggle.
eng.For what reason do you visit so often? T: For what reason do you visit so often? There is nothing more I can do for you.
eng.I have nothing for you here little messe: I have nothing for you here, poor thing. Please, I don't have long.
eng.Why did you send the messenger here agai:
Why did you send the messenger here again? Please leave, I cannot afford any further
distractions; I am the only one who can fix this now. I trust that you understand me...
How did it even manage to do that?...
eng.I would appreciate if you would not eat:
I would appreciate if you would not eat those. My umbilical will keep me conscious, but
every neuron lost is a piece of me lost as well...
eng.Why have you returned? Do you have a dea:
Why have you returned? Do you have a death wish? I have nothing
left to give you... please leave, for your own sake.
eng.You should not be here. This facility is:
You should not be here. This facility is in a constant state of decay.
Nothing in here is hospitable to the normal definition of life.
eng.I used to be furious at the idea of crea:
I used to be furious at the idea of creatures crawling through my superstructure.
However, I am actually grateful for this rare opportunity to interact.
eng.This easter egg was inspired by the orig: This easter egg was inspired by the original Moar Slugcats Dating Sim mod, but has no affiliation with the original creators.

And now you're taking it, apparently.

You get these at Five Pebbles'?

eng.Create custom scenarios using levels, it:
Create custom scenarios using levels, items and creatures
that have been unlocked in the story campaigns.
Defeating creatures or other actions can be set to award points,
but Sandbox is mostly about customization and fun!
eng.For you though, there is another way. Th:
For you though, there is another way. The old path. Go to the west past the Farm Arrays, and then down into the earth
where the land fissures, as deep as you can reach, where the ancients built their temples and danced their silly rituals.
eng.Compete in a battle against each other a:
Compete in a battle against each other and the elements.
In this mode points are awarded for food items consumed,
with surviving players always ranking above dead players.
New levels, items and creatures can be unlocked in the
story campaigns.

Now, let's see what it says.

It's a piece of sharpened rebar... What is it you want to know?
You seem proficient enough at using it.

eng.It is strange... I'm remembering myself,: It is strange... I'm remembering myself, but also... him.

You better go, <PlayerName>! I will be fine.
It's not pleasant, but I have been through it before.
